Description: Allows attackers to execute arbitrary SQL code on the database.
Enables attackers to inject malicious scripts into web pages viewed by users.
Allows an attacker to send crafted requests from a vulnerable server.
Flaws that allow attackers to compromise user accounts.
Insecure default configurations that expose applications to attacks.
Failure to protect sensitive data leading to unauthorized access.
Vulnerability in XML parsers that can lead to internal data exposure.
Allows attackers to upload malicious files without proper checks.
Flaws that allow attackers to execute arbitrary code during deserialization.
